column4: i need help i removed the wifi thing on my top menu bar and now i cant find it
right click top panel will show some choices to add
and the choice you want simply should have the name indicator-applet
check the link above, it works out of the box from 10.10 onwards
you wish to upgrade then it will work out of the box, you wish to stay in 10.04 you will need the full driver install as shown in that thread
why would you need to do that, and what source are you talking about
this is linux running in a vm?
you want to patch a kernel on a system you use?
not a good idea, if you dont even know the basics
